name: GarmentCarePros
0:
”Alexa, open Garment Care Pros”
”Alexa, tell Garment Care Pros I am on my way”
”Alexa, ask Garment Care Pros what are my store hours”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: garment care pros
Developer Terms of Use
des: Dry cleaning and laundry has never been easier! Simply have Alexa tell Garment Care Pros that "I'm on my way" and all of your clothers will be pulled, ready and waiting for you when you come in. You can even ask to have Garment Care Pros schedule a free route pickup and Alexa will let you know when your next driver will be by. The Garment Care Pros Alexa skill is indeed the easiest way to dry clean.
